nodes.text: A Human male was a nobleman of the planet Irmenu, and the father of a daughter who held the title of princess. When the nobleman's daughter fell in love with Walon Vau, the son of an Irmenu admiral and count, both the nobleman and Vau's father refused to consent to the match. The two lovers attempted to defy their parents' will, but their rebellion ended with the nobleman's daughter in an Imperius convent and the young Walon Vau's exile from Irmenu.
The Irmenu nobleman was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the fifth installment of Jason Fry's official Star Wars Blog series, The Essential Guide to Warfare: Author's Cut.
